title: Duolingo ABC helps kids stranded home learn to read and write
description: The current coronavirus pandemic forced many people to work from their homes, but we mustn't forget the impact on children either. While the young seem to be more resilient to the new virus, schools and kindergartens are closed, leaving the education of our l…
content: Surprise Today were launching Duolingo ABC a new app to teach children ages how to read Featuring fun bite sized lessons teaching fundamental reading and writing skills Get it on iOS in the US UK Ireland Canada Australia amp New Zealand chars
